libraries.name: Esplora
libraries.author: Arduino
libraries.sentence: Grants easy access to the various sensors and actuators of the Esplora. For Arduino Esplora only.
libraries.paragraph: The sensors available on the board are:2-Axis analog joystick with center push-button,4 push-buttons,microphone, light sensor, temperature sensor, 3-axis accelerometer, 2 TinkerKit input connectors./brThe actuators available on the board are: bright RGB LED, piezo buzzer, 2 TinkerKit output connectors.

libraries.name: Audio
libraries.author: Arduino
libraries.sentence: Allows playing audio files from an SD card. For Arduino DUE only.
libraries.paragraph: With this library you can use the Arduino Due DAC outputs to play audio files.br /The audio files must be in the raw .wav format.
